alert.note: Alert for Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 5:00PM EDT until May 21 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Person County in central North Carolina... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 500 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roxboro, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Roxboro, Bethel Hill, Mayo Reservoir and Surl. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
